en.description: A modified version of the Kalashnikov AK-101 that is chambered in .300 blackout.

en.name: Century Arms Draco 7.62x39 carbine
en.description: Imported from Romania by Century Arms, was likely brought here by a PMC. Absolutely a poor man's krink.

en.name: Saiga SGL31 5.45x39 Carbine
en.description: Produced by Saiga out of the Izhmash factory as a civilian version of the AK-74N. Semi automatic only, factory fitted with a 10 round magazine.

en.name: Saiga MK Ver. 030 5.45x39 Carbine
en.description: The Saiga-MK self-loading carbine is patterned after the AK74M Kalashnikov rifle. Its 030 version has a removable muzzle brake, sight leaf and an index-finger-adapted safety lock. -Export agency

en.name: Kalashnikov AK-15 7.62x39 assault rifle
en.description: The 7.62 mm AK-15 is an assault rifle used by the special operations units of the Russian military and other law enforcement agencies. The AK-15 is part of the Ratnik equipment kit.

en.name: Modified Century Arms Draco 7.62x39 Assault Rifle
en.description: A Century arms Draco, modified expertly by badger for full auto fire and a dovetail mount.

weaponpresets._name: Modified Century Arms Draco Stock preset
